Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection.utility

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PingObserver
    Observer interface for Ping (response) messages.
    TimeExpiredInterface
    Functional interface which provides a method to call when a timer maximum time expires.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientConnectionManager
    This class is responsible for detecting network problems for the Client-Server connection.
    ConnectionManager
    This class is responsible for detecting network problems for the Server-Client connection.
    PingMessage
    This class encapsulate a Ping message.
    PingObservable
    Observable class for Ping (response) messages.
    PingResponse
    This class encapsulate a Ping (response) message.
    TimeoutCounter
    Timeout(s) counter class to check if a certain amount of time is elapsed and then to trigger a specified task.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ServerResetException
    Specialized Runtime Exception to reset the Server (disconnecting all the Players) when it needs to be done.
